name: LPG storage tank
description:
1. Tank Specifications:
- Capacity: 43 m3 / 20 MT
- Type: Horizontal / Cylindrical / Aboveground
1- Special fine grain LPG steel plate P355NH
Acc to AD Merkblätter, with third party approval
2- All the materials will supply certificated and your are able to control with our officers and engineers
3- Tanks will control and approve by third Party Inspector Registration according to PED 2014/68/EU (Not ASME code) with CE marking
4- tanks coating will be according to European standards sand blasted with SA 2 1/2 quality, it will be painted primerly acrylic paint 100 microns, finishing coat will apply white and thickness of 150 microns based. Coatings are 2 (two) years under warranty
5- Design Conditions
Capacity : 43 m3
Design Pressure : 17,20 bar *1)
Test pressure : 25,80 bar *1)
*1) 23 bar max. working pressure
Design Temperature : -20 °C - +60°C
Controls (Weld seams) : Radyographic
Head Materials : P355NH
Body Materials : P355NH
Heat Treatment : Heads only
Steel plate thickness : 15 mm
6- Accessories
The tank including tank valves and ladder.
With additional price UV/Heat/Sun protection and sprinkler system.
